title: Nomar excited for charity, new season
subtitle: Nomar excited for charity event, new season
body: LOS ANGELES -- Nomar Garciaparra is nothing if not ever hopeful. Be it his professional work in baseball or his charity work with celebrity soccer-star wife Mia Hamm, the Dodgers infielder is as upbeat about the upcoming new season with a new manager as he is with the celebrity soccer challenge for charity that he and Hamm are hosting Jan. 26 at the Home Depot Center in Carson, Calif. "We don't take anything for granted," Garciaparra said Monday. Ken Gurnick is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Ken Gurnick
